ygData.subject: Re: My overcrowding solutuion (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The central premise - randomized named mob spawns - has been suggested since forever.  Except for JBoots and some of the quest mobs, Verant hasn t done it
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> Lot of good stuff is getting said in this thread. Does anyone want to edit
> it all and come up with a condensed version we can post on the official EQ
> board? Hit the key topics and list pros/cons etc. Title would be something
> like "How to Implement a Dungeon Crawl in EQ" or "Dungeon Crawls vs
> Camping". Would be interesting to see if Verant gave us their opinion on
> it.

The central premise - randomized named mob spawns - has been
suggested since forever. Except for JBoots and some of the
quest mobs, Verant hasn't done it yet. That's why I marked
the subject Off Topic. I just considered it a "what if"
thought experiment.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
